isis.stitle: DOUBLE DIAPHRAGM MGM SPRING BRAKE - CAM BRAKE ADJUSTMENT - PROPERLY ADJUSTED BRAKES - BRAKES APPLIED (Figure 22)

svcproc.title: PROPERLY ADJUSTED BRAKES - BRAKES APPLIED ( Figure 22)

figure.caption: Figure 22. Properly Adjusted Brakes - Brakes Applied

svcproc.para: To adjust the brakes, apply 80 to 90 psi air pressure to the service chamber. Refer to GROUP 04 - AIR BRAKES in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual for the correct angle between the slack adjuster arm and the pushrod and/or the pushrod length. This is necessary since different dimensions are required for automatic or manual slacks, various slack lengths and different slack adjuster manufacturers.
